p.d: Hicham meets Bastien, the young victim of a homophobic attack who is receiving help from Point G with legal formalities. Hicham falls under his spell despite knowing nothing about Bastien. Directed by: Jules Thénier, Maxime Potherat (France, 2016) Screenplay: Sullivan Le Postec Cast: Medhi Meskar (Hicham Alaoui), Eric Pucheu (Thibaut Giaccherini), Denis D'Arcangelo (Claude Favre), Nanou Harry (Nadjet Alaoui), Claudine Charreyre (Murielle Leko), Franck Fargier (Amaury Mercoeur), Claudius Pan (Bastien Lijepo), Pierre Cachia (Mickaël), François-Xavier Phan (Liao), Romain Ogerau (Laurent), AnaIs Fabre (Rose), Pascal Gilbert (Paul), Benjamin Mayet (Vincent), Jean-Christophe Bouvet (Hubert Lacombe) Genre: comedy drama Parental guidance: TV-PG
